values:
So like I haven't updated this bitch in so long but I only have a few things to say.
Like I told Justine I love her and I do. I told her I didn't want to be a problem so I would stop trying to get her to dump her boyfriend and other nonsense. The only thing I can do is give it time. Something is bound to happen, I hope.......
To those in need your in my prayers. Tiger Army rocks "Roses can't take the pain" I mean come on that line kicked ass. Well I'm outta here.
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/6928.html

HEY HEY HEY
I don't why everyone falls in love so young, Its stupid. I'll admitt it, its happend to me once and only once. I was stupid. There I said. But for all those young people out there falling in love. Fuck You. Get over it. You need to have fun while your young and do thingd you might regret. Don't waste it being a whipped ass bitch. Now I'm not saying that theres something wrong with having a boyfriend/girlfriend. Oh well I'll prolly fall in love again (I mean while I'm still young.) I don't really know where all this hate for love came from. Well Peace bitches I'm outta here.
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/6623.html

HEY HEY HEY
I don't why everyone falls in love so young, Its stupid. I'll admitt it, its happend to me once and only once. I was stupid. There I said. But for all those young people out there falling in love. Fuck You. Get over it. You need to have fun while your young and do thingd you might regret. Don't waste it being a whipped ass bitch. Now I'm not saying that theres something wrong with having a boyfriend/girlfriend. Oh well I'll prolly fall in love again (I mean while I'm still young.) I don't really know where all this hate for love came from. Well Peace bitches I'm outta here.
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/6733.html

What up niggas of the swamp. Its Spring Break and I'm still a little drunk from lastnight. hahahahah. I heard that in a movie once. I rediscover every day that life is the most beautiful gift you can ever give or recieve. You can do whatever you want with it. So if you've been paying attention to my journal entries you'll remember that I have a crush on this girl named Justine. But the problem is I think we agreed to wait till she got to high school to get together. She also had a boyfriend, and I'm to nice of a kid to try and take a girl from somebody, not like I really could though hahahaha.
So its pretty much me sitting here waiting for her to get to high school. Alex just snapped a goddam wash rag in my goddam face and it real bad. hahahahah. I'm stinky I need a shower. Peace out bitches.
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/6268.html

I'm sitting in 1st hour Spanish. This is the first time I've really got a chance to update this thing. I went snowboarding alot this month. Theres this girl I like and she might read this. I guess as the times change so do I. Well thats all I really have to say. PEACE
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/5940.html

Well yesterday Andrea, Maggie, Chuck, Megan, and Kristy unfortunately were in a car wreck. Aparrently they were "T-Boned" and, got pretty banged up. I about shit miy pants at the news, but found out everyone was ok. Tonight at "B's" house Earnie ripped my boxers off from a huge weggie. I got a gooch burn....it sucked. Life is one big delima and I'm stuck in it with choices. But anyway I guess I should be thankful for what I have. YEAH RIGHT desire is human nature. Don't Deny it completely. Ashley wanted to kiss me Friday night but she was too scared. KICK OUT THE JAMS MOTHER FUCKERS
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/5752.html

It seems to me, that last person in the Human Race. Alex and Cat went to see Maggie's brother, Jacob, play at the Hard Rock Cafe. The name of his band is From Here On. I've never heard them but I imagine they're pretty good. I feel so lonely...almost like that song by The Police. I missed out on the show for band practice. Ernie, Josh's brother, was there to mess around with us. I love that guy he's the shit. Maybe I'll find a girlfriend tomorrow
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/5377.html

Well today I went to school just like any other day. It was an Ok day, except I almost came into a close encounter with this girl. I'm totally avoiding her to the maximum. But this girl and Megan M. are walking down the hall. So I jumped over to Alex and Abbi to avoid them. Then Abbi had to fuck it up and call Megan over. So the two of them start wlaking toward the three of us, and I freak and yell "AWW GOD!" and take off running. It was Hellarious! Then me and Scotty were just talking some major shit on the Drama Club, which I hate with a passion. God I don't think I'll ever find a girlfriend. But Katie seems to think differently. Last but not least, Squeaks (Jacob Green). Go crazy ladies. He's really good at snowboarding. Alissa I FUCKING love you. KICK OUT THE JAMS MOTHER FUCKERS
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/5285.html

Today the flames for her died. It was a short lived feeling. But tonight at the basketball, during the half-time show I got a close up of the band. It was for A/V. I love that class. Right now I'm talking to Maggie about wether or not I should rip my boxers off with out taking off my pants (They have this huge hole in them)....HAHAHAHA ....She just told me to....Well I couldn't rip through the stiches or the elastic band. Today during Mr. Patton's "U.S. History" I cut the fingers out of my gloves. So at the moment all my gear is haggard and fucked. KICK OUT THE JAMS MOTHERFUCKERS
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/4933.html

Well, I gotta tell everybody that it happend, I asked her, she said yes, and it was all online. Not really my style, but more convinient this way. She makes me a little nervous. Its kinda like back in the 8th grade when you have a girlfriend but your nervous to say anything to her, for no apparent reason. But hey I'll give it time, the nervousness inside me will subside. I'm not sure just yet what we're gonna do...Go to the movies or....? I-don't-know. That set aside, its time to talk about TOMORROWS TOO LATE. Thats the band that I play bass for. We've decided to cover "Skulls" by The Misfits. Did I mention Skulls is like my favorite song? I had just got done playing a huge game of tag through out the entire school for some girls' A/V project...If you go to JCHS and watch the anouncements everyday on a regular basis, you'll prolly see it. Newt is my pickle ball partner. Um...Seth wanted me to say something about him...but I don't really have anything to say about him but that we'll go skating sometime. KICK OUT THE JAMS MOTHER FUCKERS
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/4828.html

Its Pinky!! Open the door I gots to go PE PE... Well not really but I do have to poop. So I got my pay check today and my W2 yesterday. I also bought a Frank Black album as well as Shoot For Saturday this weekend. I think Sarah might like me back cause she said we need to go to another Shoot For Saturday show together. Alexander was getting ready for school this morning. Mama feels a little under the weather. Must have been a hungry mofo... Frank Black Shoot For Saturday W2's Bank statements And my trusty old coffee cup KICK OUT THE JAMS MOTHER FUCKERS
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/4393.html

Well this weekend was ok, Friday I went to this show at NTF church and saw this band Shoot For Saturday. They were good. I saw this girl Sarah Scott there and we hung out and had fun, and now I like her. Check out the photos mofos Got back to school Friday. I woke up Sunday to this beautiful ending of the sunrise over the snow. KICK OUT THE JAMS MOTHER FUCKERS CHRISTOPHER
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/4151.html

Hey, whats up people?
Right now I'm in the computer lab at school,
second hour spanish.
It sucks....THATS LIFE
KICK OUT THE JAMS MOTHER FUCKERS
 CHRISTOPHER
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/4059.html

So its been 11 months (to the day) since I woke from a coma. Its snowing like fuckin crazy dude. Well it was. The plan is to go sledding then to work, if mama sees it permisable. I haven't been to school since Tuesday, its been a pleasant break. Well thats it. Check out the photographs. It was snowing when I woke up. I have to have that nicotine or I freak. Well no skating but maybe some snow boarding. Alex wanted a smoke too, so I gave him one. KICK OUT THE JAMS MOTHER FUCKERS CHRISTOPHER A. L. GENT
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/3806.html

Well as the world spins in it's scientific way, we make decisions that shape our life. These decisions will cahnge our life's and other people's little by little. Everyone on this Earth has a one track mind, in one way or another. As I try to make the perfect life for myself, I have to take in to consideration the people I affect everyday. Life is a hard game to play. No one might understand what I'm rambleing on about. But if they think about it they will. I liked a girl named Maggie. But she unfortunatley didn't show the fondness back.This causes chemical reactions in the body, mainly the brain. I have to find someone else to fill a void in my life. Theres a few girls at the moment that I have feelings for. Maggie, Alissa, Megan, (Taake), Nikki (prolly forever, though I hate her) Justine, Kelly. I can't help what I feel. Ps: I got suspended for mooning the P.E. class. But check out these photos. Patton's the shit. He's suppose to help us with this history movie. Paul is black. I like Paul because kids don't. We're learning about Hilter and Mussolini right now. They're were Geniouses, but not smart enough. My cd player is jacked. This girl is cute but she don't me a thing to me. Well I'm outta here.
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/3341.html

Seth wants to know when were gonna skate. I told him prolly next week. God, that that MTV movie jailbate keeps running through my head. So does that Ludo song "Hum Along" Good God. Check it out. Jake: mute grab. I got jacked doing a blunt transfer. I had fun hanging out by myself up there. Graham invited us out to Ramp Riders for a Midnight hesh sesh. John, Graham's brother looks kinda like Jesus. Heres the KR3W. Tom, me, and Jake kinda got lost and drove for like a 100 miles on the interstate till found the Alton exit. THATS LIFE. I'M GOING TO SMOKE.
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/3209.html

Luke is beating the shit out of a snare drum, Jake is playing the acustic, and they're calling it music. peakers on my computer are balsting outRobert Bladwin's voice. Last night I went to the basketball game.Suprisingly our team held the lead for most of the game. That rarely happens. I was hanging out with this girl named Justine. Shes gorgeous.But shes so young. Shes in 8th Grade and I'm halfway through my junior year of higschool. Anyway I think I pissed Jim off last night. I started messing with this camera, but I didn't know it was the camera in program. So it went out over Channel 12. thank God I didn't focus in on anything that would've gotten me thrown out of the class. Jim was pissed and I felt bad. I also practiced with the band Thursday. Then today it was just me and Dan practicing.We have something going with motivtion. But its skill that I lack but I'm improving. Anyway heres some photos. Josh is good at the drums but hes always fucking around. This guy used to do acid and play in a rock n roll band. But hes dead now. Dan kicks ass on guitar. He always tries to make the song better by changing some part. It makes it kinda hard for me to remember how the song goes. Theres me lighting up a smoke. After we got done practicing thursday Dan wooped Josh's ass in football and air hockey. Anway thats it I'm going to Ramp Riders to skate.
http://mykonstantine13.livejournal.com/3012.html
